articles.title: Your washing machine is lying to you about how long a cycle is

articles.summary: The average washing machine cycle runs over by 11 minutes. The most common reason behind this is down to how much detergent you add to the machine. articles.summary: Honey Bun is planning to open its first expanded Swirls location in New Kingston within the next two months. The new outlet will offer an upgraded customer experience compared to the original Half-Way-Tree shop, with more seating, an expanded menu and a visual production set-up similar to international chains like Cinnabon. The New Kingston shop is the first of several planned locations, with others being considered for Papine in St Andrew, May Pen, Clarendon, and Montego Bay in St James. Honey Bun was acquired by the company in June 2024 at a price tag of $9 million.

articles.summary: Sexy Red has a new single 'YN' which is a collaboration with a song that emerged from her recent appearance. She is making waves again with her latest single 'Yyn' which came out of her recent show. She has also released a second single 'Oy'.

articles.title: Brooklyn Beckham announces exciting new collaboration as he grows his food empire
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: Brooklyn Beckham shared his latest recipe on Friday. He announced the launch of his new hot sauce brand Cloud23, available exclusively at Whole Foods shops in the UK back in October. Cloud 23 is named after the No.23 jersey his father wore at the game.

articles.summary: The plan could also be a freemium model where users can try out some features before signing up for the subscription. It's possible the plan could be available on a trial-and-try model. It could also have a subscription-only model.

articles.title: 5 things I learned when I tested the LG C5 OLED TV, from embracing AI ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: I recently tested and reviewed the LG C5 OLED TV and I've selected 5 key things you should know about it, including what you need to know about its design and features. It's a great TV for watching on the gobsmack TV screen.

articles.title: Updated Substance 3D Painter makes precise detailing and mask creation easier, plus a sneak peek at Designer improvements (Adobe Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: The latest version of Substance 3D Painter debuted recently at GDC 2025. It's easier than ever to craft precise details and create masks. Damien Guimoneau also gave a sneak peek at powerful new rendering capabilities coming to Substance 3d Painter.

articles.title: Video: China's humanoid robot helps with hair styling, hotel services, car parking
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: Chinese startup MagicLab has showcased its latest humanoid and four-legged robots. The service robots perform various tasks to assist customers in a shopping mall. The company is supported by robotic cleaner producer Dreame. It was founded two years ago and plans to develop more robots.

articles.title: Robinhood Introduces Cash Deliveries with New Bank Accounts
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Robinhood, a fintech platform for buying and selling stocks, ETFs, and cryptocurrencies, announced a slew of new products and services on Wednesday. The Gold membership program gives users access to the company's premium features and the new banking program. It will offer traditional checking accounts, high-yield savings accounts, and other private banking services for individuals and families. The program also offers instant transfers and wire services.

articles.title: Reinventing Visual Signifiers: How AI Is Reshaping Symbol and Graphic Design
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing the design industry. AI-powered image generation tools have redefined the design process by automating repetitive tasks. The blend of human intuition with AI's data-driven insights produces visuals that are both innovative and meaningful. AI's influence on visual communication is reshaping not only design aesthetics and the creative industry.

articles.title: Abuja tech giant launches MyGSMVillage repairs platform in Nigeria
articles.author: Bode Olagoke
articles.summary: TechBooky Elite has launched MyGSMVillage, an online platform designed to connect smartphone users with certified repair technicians. The service is currently available in Abuja and Lagos, with plans to expand to ten additional states in Nigeria within the next three months.

articles.title: Meghan Trainor Helps Consumers Reimagine and "Re-Train" Their Laundry Routine
articles.summary: Meghan Trainor shares her laundry tips with ARM & HAMMER POWER SHEETS as part of their latest campaign. The new version of her song 'Been Like This' has been re-imagined as 'Toss Like This,' which highlights the ease of doing laundry and the convenient convenience of the sheets.

articles.title: Buy European! Are EU Products booming due to US-Tensions?
articles.author: Misch Pautsch
articles.summary: GoEuropean is a website where people can search for European and Luxembourgish alternatives to American products. It was created by Laura Catz, co-founder of the "Goeuropean" website. It is registering around 20,000 visitors a day. Around 60 volunteers from all over Europe are involved in the project.
